about_the_game:
"If there is one thing you would really want to do before you graduate, what would it be?"


In Between All Times is a cinematic-visual novel about an graduate student's struggles finding purpose and identity, set in a surreal future in the stars.

STORY


You, a final year university student facing graduation soon, one day meet a mysterious campus ghost in your clubroom.

In this unexpected encounter the mysterious ghost named Byeol decides to join your club.

Together in this Literature Club, you and your new friend decides to complete a small goal you had always longed to fulfill.
To write a short novel before graduation.

SO, IN BETWEEN ALL TIME...


"A story about one's very personal yet confusing creative journey."



A campus life in Space
Enjoy your last year on a campus set in space, experience familiar moments of life in a unfamiliar world



Creative visuals of different art styles and motion graphics
From quality ECGs to Cartoon CGs, Motion Graphic visuals will help you dive into the world of In Between All Times



All for story, a Kinetic Novel

DEVELOPMENT



Studio Elysian is a South Korean story-based game development team founded in 2022.

The team consists of a diverse range of talents throughout Korea, with backgorunds in Film production, Comic Arts, Music Video Production and even Vocaloid Production.

name: In Between All Times

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10 64bit /11
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB Video Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Direct Sound

short_description: In Between All Timesis a cinematic-visual novel about an graduate student's struggles finding purpose and identity, set in a surreal future in the stars.
